article: a fire begun and nourished by oxygen generators was the cause of the crash of a valujet plane in the florida everglades ## months ago , but ultimately the accident , which killed all ### people aboard , occurred because of supervisory failures by the airline and by the federal aviation administration , the national transportation safety board said on tuesday .
